ygData.subject: Re: Lanys T'yvl...
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, Im a Male Emchanter now lvl 13~I never said I was handed 120pp (that would be nice) Ive never had to ask for $$ but have always buffed or helped out
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, Im a Male Emchanter now lvl 13~I never said
I was handed 120pp (that would be nice) <br>Ive
never had to ask for $$ but have always buffed or
helped out when I noticed they were in a lil bind~Pays
off (literally) Ive recieved 10pp here 20pp
there~ADDING up to a sum of around 120pp<br>Maybe you should
change servers if youve never seen such generosity. At
least start a new charactor on the server & try it
out...<br>Most of my plat have been given n BB<br>it i all in
all a good server though
